name: Shell Adrift
description:
Made in 48 hrs for the Global Game Jam Online 2021;
Assirem IAICHOUCHEN - Art
Gabriel HEUZE - Art
Samuel GAY - Code, design, music, sound.

Game jam theme: Lost and found.

Description: A short game about getting lost in a strange maze-like underwater temple, where doors do not work how they should.
Meet the people who've been cursed to wander the depths forever.
